languages.text: Слухи гласят, что у чужих звезд Ирлиэт и Паскаль встретились вновь. Дружина воинов эльдар пыталась охранить древнюю планетарную конструкцию своего народа от жадных слуг Омниссии. Узнав, что возглавляет ксеносов Ирлиэт, Паскаль лично сошел на планету и сразил былую соратницу. Гибель ее не пробудила в железном сердце никаких чувств.

Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.
languages.original_text: Слухи гласят, что у чужих звезд Ирлиэт и Паскаль встретились вновь. Дружина воинов эльдар пыталась охранить древнюю планетарную конструкцию своего народа от жадных слуг Омниссии. Узнав, что возглавляет ксеносов Ирлиэт, Паскаль лично сошел на планету и сразил былую соратницу. Гибель ее не пробудила в железном сердце никаких чувств.

Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended upon the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

languages.text: 有传言说，伊莉耶特与帕斯卡在其他行星再次相遇。当时一群艾达灵族正在努力保护古老的行星建筑，努力击退欧姆尼塞亚贪婪的仆人。当帕斯卡得知这群异形的首领正是伊莉耶特之后，他亲自降落到了那颗行星，亲手杀死了他曾经的战友。对铁石心肠的帕斯卡而言，伊莉耶特的死没有激起一丝波澜。
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，伊莉耶特与帕斯卡在其他行星再次相遇。当时一群艾达灵族正在努力保护古老的行星建筑，努力击退欧姆尼塞亚贪婪的仆人。当帕斯卡得知这群异形的首领正是伊莉耶特之后，他亲自降落到了那颗行星，亲手杀死了他曾经的战友。对铁石心肠的帕斯卡而言，伊莉耶特的死没有激起一丝波澜。

languages.text: 噂によると、ユリエットとパスカルは未知の惑星で再会したという。アエルダリの兵士の一団が自分たちの民族の古代の巨大建築を、万機神の強欲なしもべから守ろうとしていた。ユリエットが異種族を率いているのを知り、パスカルは直接惑星に降りて昔の仲間の息の根を止めた。彼女の死は彼の鋼の心に何の感情も呼び起こさなかった。
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: 噂によると、ユリエットとパスカルは未知の惑星で再会したという。アエルダリの兵士の一団が自分たちの民族の古代の巨大建築を、万機神の強欲なしもべから守ろうとしていた。ユリエットが異種族を率いているのを知り、パスカルは直接惑星に降りて昔の仲間の息の根を止めた。彼女の死は彼の鋼の心に何の感情も呼び起こさなかった。

languages.text: D'après la rumeur, Yrliet et Pasqal se retrouvèrent parmi les étoiles d'un monde étranger. Des guerriers aeldaris tentaient de protéger un ancien édifice planétaire de leur peuple contre les serviteurs cupides de l'Omnimessie. En apprenant qu'Yrliet menait les xénos, Pasqal descendit personnellement sur la planète et terrassa son ancienne compagne d'armes. La mort de cette dernière n'émut pas du tout son cœur de métal.
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: D'après la rumeur, Yrliet et Pasqal se retrouvèrent parmi les étoiles d'un monde étranger. Des guerriers aeldaris tentaient de protéger un ancien édifice planétaire de leur peuple contre les serviteurs cupides de l'Omnimessie. En apprenant qu'Yrliet menait les xénos, Pasqal descendit personnellement sur la planète et terrassa son ancienne compagne d'armes. La mort de cette dernière n'émut pas du tout son cœur de métal.

languages.text: Según los rumores, Yrliet y Pasqal volvieron a encontrarse entre estrellas desconocidas. Una partida de guerreros Aeldari trató de defender una antigua construcción planetaria de su gente frente a los codiciosos sirvientes del Omnissiah. Al descubrir que Yrliet lideraba a los xenos, Pasqal descendió al planeta en persona y mató a su antigua compañera de batalla. Su muerte no despertó ningún sentimiento en su corazón metálico.
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: Según los rumores, Yrliet y Pasqal volvieron a encontrarse entre estrellas desconocidas. Una partida de guerreros Aeldari trató de defender una antigua construcción planetaria de su gente frente a los codiciosos sirvientes del Omnissiah. Al descubrir que Yrliet lideraba a los xenos, Pasqal descendió al planeta en persona y mató a su antigua compañera de batalla. Su muerte no despertó ningún sentimiento en su corazón metálico.

languages.text: Gerüchten zufolge haben Yrliet und Pasqal sich in den fremden Sternen wiedergetroffen. Eine Gruppe von Aeldari-Kriegern wollte ein altes planetares Gebäude ihres Volks vor gierigen Dienern des Omnissiah beschützen. Als Pasqal erfuhr, dass Yrliet die Xenos anführte, kam er selbst auf den Planeten und erschlug seine frühere Waffenkameradin. Ihr Tod weckte in seinem Metallherzen keinerlei Gefühl.
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: Gerüchten zufolge haben Yrliet und Pasqal sich in den fremden Sternen wiedergetroffen. Eine Gruppe von Aeldari-Kriegern wollte ein altes planetares Gebäude ihres Volks vor gierigen Dienern des Omnissiah beschützen. Als Pasqal erfuhr, dass Yrliet die Xenos anführte, kam er selbst auf den Planeten und erschlug seine frühere Waffenkameradin. Ihr Tod weckte in seinem Metallherzen keinerlei Gefühl.

languages.text: Yrliet ve Pasqal'ın yabancı yıldızlarda bir yerde yeniden karşılaştığı söylenir. Bir grup savaşçı Aeldari, halklarına ait kadim bir gezegen mabedini Hermesih'in açgözlü hizmetkârlarından korumaya çalışıyormuş. Zenoların başında Yrliet'in olduğunu öğrenen Pasqal, gezegene bizzat inmiş ve eski silah arkadaşını kendisi öldürmüş. Yrliet'in ölümü, Pasqal'ın metal kalbinde hiçbir duyguyu ortaya çıkarmamış.
languages.original_text: Rumour has it that Yrliet and Pasqal met again among the alien stars. A band of Aeldari warriors were trying to protect an ancient planetary edifice of their people from the covetous servants of the Omnissiah. Upon learning that Yrliet was leading the xenos, Pasqal personally descended to the planet and struck down his former comrade-in-arms. Her death did not stir any feelings in his metallic heart.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet ve Pasqal'ın yabancı yıldızlarda bir yerde yeniden karşılaştığı söylenir. Bir grup Aeldari savaşçısı, halklarının kadim bir gezegen yapısını, Hermesih'in açgözlü hizmetkârlarından korumaya çalışıyormuş. Zenoları Yrliet'in yönettiğini öğrenen Pasqal, gezegene bizzat inmiş ve eski silah arkadaşını kendisi öldürmüş. Yrliet'in ölümü, Pasqal'ın metal kalbinde herhangi bir duygunun ortaya çıkmasına neden olmamış.
